COVID-19 circulated in US weeks earlier than thought, mistaken for flu - health official tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735219 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735219/covid-19-circulated-in-us-weeks-earlier-than-thought-mistaken-for-flu-health-official/story/ The novel coronavirus circulated in January in California, weeks earlier than thought, and early deaths were likely mistaken for the flu, a county health official said on Wednesday. May pneumonia po siya noong dumating dito tapos nabigyan lang po ng tamang gamot at naalagaan ng mga doktor,” Dionisio said. Thu, 23 Apr 2020 00:38:14 +0800

2 brgy. tanod sa Bulacan na nanita ng lalaking lumabag daw sa ECQ, ginulpi ng magkakaanak tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735198 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735198/2-brgy-tanod-sa-bulacan-na-nanita-ng-lalaking-lumabag-daw-sa-eqc-ginulpi-ng-magkakaanak/story/ Putok ang noo, nalagasan ng ngipin at nagtamo ng mga galos at pasa sa katawan ang dalawang barangay tanod sa Baliuag, Bulacan matapos silang gulpihin ng mga kaanak ng isang lalaking sinita nila dahil pagala-gala umano habang ipinatutupad ang enhanced community quarantine.
